ygData.subject: Re: Headin' Out
ygData.msgSnippet: Aracnia watches Darkmouse walk off. She saved her life, and this was her payback? Leave. Go. Abandon us in our time of need. And once your out, dont bother

    Aracnia watches Darkmouse walk off. She saved her life, and this was her 
payback? "Leave. Go. Abandon us in our time of need. And once your out, dont 
bother coming back, or I'll sic Tarantulas on you."
    Hell Beast now was looking into the opening, his scanners picked up  the 
oxygen catastrophy. But these bots bots were still here...and a threat to any 
possible colonization efforts.
    "Your cleared from all charges. But, your presence here has become 
undesireable. You have 5 days to get every transformer off the planet or you 
all will be destroyed." Hell Beast said with arrogance.
    "Ah, I thought this would happen. I dont suppose killing you would stop 
you then?" Aracnia said as she raised her bowcaster.
    "No, in fact it would only make things much wor-" He stopped as Aracnia 
blew off his head. His body sank to the ground like a dead weight.
    "get rid of it. Tarantulas, we had better think of something. These 
aliens are pissed."

    Megatron returns to the Cave and see's its a mess, and battle is brewing. 
"KITKAT! REPORT HERE AT ONCE! Waspinator, bring up communications, Im going 
to get back into that ship!"
